name: Phase 10 Score Keeper
description:
Forget about arguing over who has to keep score or scrambling to find scrap paper to write on. Thanks to Phase 10 Score Keeper, keeping track of phases, points, dealers, and everything in between has never been easier!

The simple, but powerful interface allows you to meticulously document every step of the game in lightning fast speed, letting you quickly get back to completing phases.

This easy-to-use app will surely be a hit on game night!

Features:
-18 game variations including Island Paradise, Cocoa Canyon, Twist, and Disco Fever!
-Full score keeping, including phases, automatic descriptions, and points.
-Automatic totaling
-Dealer tracking across rounds
-Multiplayer Mode allows nearby players to connect and share results

Note: this is an unofficial, third-party app meant to be used as a companion to the Phase 10 card game and has NO affiliation with Mattel.
